title: Publication on Tamayouz Excellence Award
description: Thanks to the Tamayouz Excellence Award for publishing my thesis work. I am deeply grateful to everyone who has supported me throughout this journey.

title: Featured by IPDC Finance
description: Thanks to IPDC Finance for featuring me along with 12 inspiring young talents in the upcoming calendar year.

title: Top 50: Tamayouz Excellence Award for Architecture
description: My 5-2 thesis "Synanthropic Corridor: Rethinking Human-Elephant interactions through community conservation in Northern Bangladesh" has been selected as one of the top 50 submissions received this year.

title: NDNSC Workshop
description: On November 23, I conducted a workshop on Nature-based Photography to inspire young enthusiasts about wildlife documentation, sharing the floor with Sadman Shiper.

title: Featured on The Business Standard
description: Got featured in today's "The Business Standard" newspaper for being recognized as a 2024 Regional Winner for my project "Synanthropic Corridor."
